p.d: "Life is Just a Ride" is a is a thought-provoking and uplifting documentary based upon the positive mindset of three different characters during Simple Session, one of the biggest and longest-running action sports events in the world. Reed Stark is a world-renowned BMX rider from the United States. Madars Apse is one of the best European skateboarders. Risto Kalmre is one of the masterminds behind the event that came to life from a pile of dirt 20 years ago in Estonia.
